website_summaries.verdict: It’s potty training 101 with this doll, a life phase that toddlers will instantly relate to.
pros: A “drink and wet” doll with the added feature of a training potty rather than a diaper
“Mom” and “dad” modes promote inclusion for girls and boys
Stickers and hygiene accessories duplicate the potty training experience that young kids are going through
cons: Can get messy, especially if the kids are utilizing that “drink and wet” feature often
Kids over age 5 may be bored by this toy

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll, but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cute doll, but I was very disappointed when I realized that she doesn’t really drink and pee like the other baby alive that eat and poops and it needs the diaper changed. Her body just makes the sound of the water dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Glad I

customer_reviews.title: Creepy!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m giving this a poor review. It is pretty creepy with the sounds and scared my daughter. I attached a video.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Doll was great. Packaging was rough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my daughter as a birthday gift that could help her potty train. The doll is great and it includes all the accessories. She likes the doll and it really is helping teach her about the potty. The package I was sent was in pretty rough shape. It had clearly been opened before and was torn up a bit. I would have been angry if it had been a gift for someone else but my daughter is little and didn't seem to notice or care.
customer_reviews.author: Msb

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my grand daughter who is starting to be interested in potty training. The doll really helps to keep her in the mood to try. The doll is very good at saying the right things to my grand daughter to teach her what is expected. It's comical too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This doll is really nice, and I hope that it will inspire my daughter to use the potty as well. It's pretty neat how it will move and dance--I didn't expect that. It is supposed to settle onto the potty and know when to go, but I myself have had difficulty getting it to work consistently. I like that it comes with accessories like 'handsoap' to give her the full potty experience. She just turned two so I think she is a little young to fully play with it, and she hasn't embraced it as much as her other dolls. Hopefully she will like it more as she gets a little older.
customer_reviews.author: PammySS

customer_reviews.title: Great for age 8
customer_reviews.text: 8yoa loves this. I purchased a previous baby alive (the one that crawls) where the water leaked inside the dolls body (electrical part). Either this is made better, or I was just unlucky. I like that the baby will only go potty on the actual potty that comes with the doll. It guarantees the toy won’t leak on furniture etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my toddler for christmas. She is going to love it, I also am thinking it will be great as a potty training visiual. So win win! I did make sure she worked since she's going to be sitting until December.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but some features aren't needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll to help with potty training. I'm not sure if the talking really adds to anything, and the doll does this weird potty dance that's actually a little scary (very jerky and weird), so we never turn on the sign. I do like that it won't pee without pushing the button on it's belly.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old has zero interest in this doll. She actually took the doll and put it back in the box. So much for this helping us with potty training
customer_reviews.author: Katiep

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll, only one problem
customer_reviews.text: This doll is cute, she speaks, dances, pees, but I couldn't make her pee on potty. She is supposed to pee only when sitting on the potty, but she never did. When I took her, then she peed. Maybe I was doing something wrong. My little niece might be able to figure that out. I'll leave it up to her. :)
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy for a child.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but hard to play with without hitting the button on the stomach. Hair is destroyed after a couple weeks. It’s a very heavy doll so my three year old doesn’t like carrying her around much. I don’t see this being something we keep long. I’d prefer a lighter wait babydoll.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointing doll does not work..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll for my 5 year old daughter and to her disappointment this doll did not go potty. I would return it but, I already threw the box away. I just wanted to report the disappointment for such a pricey doll. I tried calling the company and got no answer.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Sica

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll especially for those little ones being Potty trained
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was in love when she opened this gift, she didn’t even care about any other presents. She loved that she talked and that she had a potty seat! My granddaughter was in the early stages of potty training so this was perfect for her and she wanted to show her baby how to potty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: Just what my Granddaughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: This doll was exactly as advertised. This was a gift for my granddaughter's 7th birthday and she loves it. I thought the hair on the doll was especially nice and soft. I very much liked that this doll only pees. Did not want to deal with the other possibility!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Look, I love this little doll. Bought it for my baby girl for Santa. Wish It came with some extra outfits or something though. I can't find anything to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Gober

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves her
customer_reviews.text: Trying to teach my daughter how to use the potty and hoping this will motivate her to as well. The doll dances when she has to go potty and has both a “mommy” and “daddy” switch on the back which I think is sweet. She has the option to drink and use the bathroom but I haven’t tried that feature yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set. Thought it would help my kid with potty training. I'm sure it does for other kids but just not mine. I like that it talks or you can turn that off.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt pee right, hard plastic, and kind of slippery. hard to hold
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little dolly
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 y.o. daughter loves this toy. She enjoys taking the baby to the potty and helping her with her undies. She loves that the baby tells her that she needs to go potty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Georges

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's daughter
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this? Its a doll but speak to my daughter and its the best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: RSAP

customer_reviews.title: TO EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: THERE ARE BETTER DOLLS FOR THEM MONEY. THIS DOLL IS NOT WORTH THE MONEY PIT IT IS. MY GRAND DAUGHTER PLAYED WITH IT FOR ABOUT A MONTH AND GOT TIRED OF IT. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll-Amazon was definitely lowest price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this cute doll to give as a gift. Unfortunately; it turns out she has already received one. I will be returning.Good quality toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, hard to let it “dance” like when you holding the hands to stand it up the legs bend back to sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: Kirst

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I like the doll however one of her legs doesnt sit right. Its off a bit so when she sits on the potty she just falls over. Very dissapointed. Plus it looks weird. My daughter keeps trying to fix it and gets really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: JENAE ZANDSTRA

customer_reviews.title: Some potty issues cannot be overcome
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a fine product. Unfortunately, our granddaughter has other potty training issues that cannot be overcome with a dolly. Has she been a normal child, I’ll bet this would have helped her. We’ll save it for her younger sister, and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: M. Abramovitz

customer_reviews.title: Baby Alive Potty Dance
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this doll. It's exactly like advertised. It was a hit at her birthday party--and still is a hit with her.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: We used this doll to potty train my granddaughter. She LOVED it! She quickly put up the rewards chart, her mom made one for her and she is potty trained as of this weekend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rina Chaves

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: She doesn't actually pee, it's just the sound effect. I'm so disappointed. I was excited to use it as a potty training tool.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter absolutely loves this. She has most of the baby alive dolls and this one is one of her favorites. It's super cute, and does quite a few different things.
customer_reviews.author: Haley W

customer_reviews.title: Very cute Baby Alive
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Baby Alive. Has become my daughters favorite. Accessories are very durable. Amazon was best price by far!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Senn

customer_reviews.title: Directions
customer_reviews.text: I felt they should of had some written directions instead of a paper on how to pee! At 75 I had to push the tummy and move the buttons, Was very hard to see stuff and no directions on what all it did.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift-December 2018
customer_reviews.text: I bought Baby Alive Potty Dance doll for a family friend's daughter and she loves her doll very much. She sleeps with her doll.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for older toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift very pleaded with kinda hard for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Would suggest and was age appropriate for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: The 4 year old child loved it. Very durable and fun for the child as a Christmas present

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves her baby and it still works

customer_reviews.title: Baby Alive Doll
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this doll! It is a nice size and the potty feature is hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 5 years daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and reasonable price. It’s really surprised me. My daughter loves it. It’s good for birthday gift too
customer_reviews.author: Yu Ma

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Three Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Goddaughter loved Baby Alive and loves brushing her hair. She loves that she goes potty just like she does and the little dance she does when she has to go. Well made doll and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tara D. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Quality made doll.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves these things, every one I get her has more features than the last.

customer_reviews.title: Little girls will love this.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is so happy bring a little mommy. She wants to give her a bottle constantly so she can see the doll really tinkle.

customer_reviews.title: Baby alive
customer_reviews.text: Legs were locked when we received it. stickers were stuck to the package and a bunch of them came off. Other than that my daughter was happy

customer_reviews.title: Price and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 8 yr old niece for Christmas and she loved it

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The doll is cute, however she does not stand up properly to “dance” like advertised. She’s also very heavy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my young 7 year old daughter!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little daughter, she loves it! She carries it with her everywhere and she loves playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Happiest 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: She’s exactly what I’m little girl wanted. She loves her!

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this doll and it is helping her potty train. She was afraid of it at first but only because she was afraid to hurt it.

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year Old Daughter Loves!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter thinks this doll is hilarious! She plays with her and laughs for hours!

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the batteries didn't work upon arrival. Not a huge deal but it was inconvenient to find batteries on Christmas day

customer_reviews.title: Quality

customer_reviews.text: We bought this doll to potty train our 2yr old. She loved it!! Only has a few minor issues getting the doll to go pee when sitting on her potty. Overall would definitely recommend this doll, especially for potty training!

customer_reviews.title: My 2 years old liked!

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters favorite Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Love this doll. My granddaughter and niece also loved this doll.

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: For the price this doll does a lot of things. It also aided in getting my granddaughter interested in toilet training. The stickers are fun for her too.

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Device
customer_reviews.text: This doll seems to have helped during the training process. I was advised by my daughter to get it for my three year old granddaughter for Christmas and she was potty trained in less than a month.

customer_reviews.title: Great doll!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll. It is helping her with potty training also. 5 stars all day.

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Potty Dance Baby: Talking Baby Doll with Blonde Hair, Potty, Rewards Chart, Undies and More, Doll That “Pees” on Her Potty, for Girls and Boys 3 Years Old And Up
product_meta.description:
Style:StandardBaby Alive Potty Dance baby is growing up so fast! She can say and sing more than 50 phrases and sings a song! This sweet Baby Alive doll loves to says sweet phrases like “I love you, Mommy.” Hold her left hand and she’ll dance, too! After feeding Potty Dance baby water from her bottle, she’ll say, “Uh oh! I gotta go!” Put baby doll on her potty and she’ll “pee” on it. She drinks and wets! Use the included pretend soap dispenser to clean her and don’t forget to give her a star on her rewards chart to celebrate this special milestone! Before putting baby to bed, brush her soft hair with her very own comb (included). 

Baby Alive and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro. Warning - Choking Hazard – Small parts will be generated
feature_bullets: 50+ FUN PHRASES IN MOMMY AND DADDY MODES: Baby speaks to Mommy or Daddy in two unique modes at the flip of switch.
TALKS IN ENGLISH OR SPANISH: Baby talks in English or Spanish and says cute phrases like “Time to go potty!” and “Yay, I did it!” She even sings a song!
TIME TO GO & CELEBRATE: Give baby her bottle and she’ll “pee” on her potty. Mark baby’s progress with stickers and a rewards chart to celebrate when she does it!
AFTER POTTY, IT’S WASH UP TIME: After baby drinks and wets, use included pretend soap dispenser to keep baby clean then pretend to wash her hands then give her lots of cuddles
GREAT FOR KIDS AGE 3+: Little mommies and daddies can have fun giving their baby her bottle. She’s the perfect doll for girls and boys 3 years old and up.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars363 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
